statements: SELECT * FROM campaign_reports WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, revenue FROM campaign_reports;
SELECT * FROM campaign_reports WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name FROM campaign_reports WHERE conversions >= 5;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, cost FROM campaign_reports WHERE clicks < 10;
SELECT * FROM campaign_reports WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, cost, revenue FROM campaign_reports WHERE impressions > 10000 AND conversions > 50 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, cost, revenue FROM campaign_reports WHERE impressions BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 AND clicks BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, cost, revenue FROM campaign_reports WHERE cost > 500 AND revenue > 1000 ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, clicks, conversions, cost, revenue FROM campaign_reports WHERE clicks >= 50 AND conversions <= 10 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, total_budget, status FROM campaigns WHERE total_budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_budget, status FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_budget, status FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, total_budget ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget, status FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, revenue FROM campaigns INNER JOIN campaign_data ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_data.campaign_id WHERE conversions > 0 AND revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaigns INNER JOIN campaign_data ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_data.campaign_id WHERE conversions > clicks AND impressions > 1000 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT impression_id, impression_date, impression_count FROM Impressions ORDER BY impression_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Clicks WHERE click_count >= 100;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) AS impression_count FROM Impressions GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT c.campaign_name, i.impression_count FROM Campaigns c JOIN (SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) AS impression_count FROM Impressions GROUP BY campaign_id) i ON c.campaign_id = i.campaign_id;
SELECT c.campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS click_count FROM Campaigns c JOIN Impressions i ON c.campaign_id = i.campaign_id JOIN Clicks cl ON i.impression_id = cl.impression_id GROUP BY c.campaign_name;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, cost FROM ads ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT conversion_value, conversion_date FROM conversions WHERE conversion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_group_name, bids FROM ad_groups WHERE bids BETWEEN 10.00 AND 20.00;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, cost FROM ads JOIN ad_groups ON ads.ad_group_id = ad_groups.id WHERE ad_groups.bids > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM campaigns JOIN ad_groups ON campaigns.id = ad_groups.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT ad_name, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM ads GROUP BY ad_name HAVING total_clicks >= 1000;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, impressions, (clicks / impressions) * 100 AS click_through_rate FROM ads WHERE impressions > 0 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT Clicks.click_id, Campaigns.campaign_name, Clicks.click_date FROM Clicks JOIN Campaigns ON Clicks.campaign_id = Campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) AS num_impressions FROM Impressions GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(roi_amount) AS total_roi FROM ROI GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS click_count FROM Clicks WHERE click_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_date FROM Campaigns JOIN Conversions ON Campaigns.campaign_id = Conversions.campaign_id;
SELECT AVG(roi_amount) AS avg_roi FROM ROI WHERE campaign_id = 2;
